string.text: I'm looking for a safe house to settle in. Would you answer?
I just have an empty back room. It has a sofa to sleep in and a safe where you can store your personal belongings. It can also safely survive a surge. For 30000 rubles it will be yours.
Great. Go into the room and make yourself at home. I'll tell Garik to let you through. Come back whenever you like.
